title: Sony Vegas Pro 13.0 Build 373 ENG
description:
Powerful tool for video editing facing professionals.
Description: Vegas Pro is a dedicated video editing tool for the professional public. With it, you can make fine adjustments to the video and audio media file. In addition, it has a wide compatibility to work with Blu-ray discs, 4K technology and custom edit content.
The tool is also integrated with other devices. Now you can connect it with iPads and work collaboratively across different platforms. This way, you can even invite others to participate in the editing process and create even more amazing movies.
Thousands tools:
The program interface are distributed dozens of buttons for editing, video capture and execution. At the top right, one player offers the main options to trigger recording media and content. At the bottom are the timelines for dealing with audio and video files individually.
When you make an edit, the software makes only one of the tracks is changed and keeps the rest as in the original. In addition, the application has major additions to extract CD audio tracks, cropping videos, import them, capture them etc.

Name: Sony Vegas Pro
Version: 13.0 Build 373
Platform: Windows Vista / 7/8 / 8.1
Developer: Sony Creative Software
Category: Video Editors
English Language

Release Date: 2014

Processor Dual Core or higher to use the 4K

Installation:
After Download "Sony Vegas Pro 13.0 Build 373 + Activator", will have only two (2) files inside the installer and the Activator.
First, run the installer (Vegas Pro 13.0 Build 373 Installer), and install normally. After the end of the installation, finish it - not the run. On the Taskbar, just leave, or the "Task Manager".
After exiting the program, copy the Crack / Activator (activator ENG). After you copy, move it to the directory where the program is installed, for example: "C: Program FilesSonyVegas Pro 13.0". Like the image below:
